Text.Page:
We've got {@LinkCreature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crushers}, {@LinkCreature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shamans}, and {@LinkCreature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers} all over the upper levels. Clear 'em out!

When you're done, report to {@Creature:246#1014} at {@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}.

Well done.

Hard to do research when the corridors aren't safe.

Eliminate {@LinkCreature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crushers}, {@LinkCreature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shamans}, and {@LinkCreature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers}. I'll reward your inevitable victory.
